attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With Lord Mandelson taking over most of government, he should be given the name Pooh Bah. In the G&S opera the Mikado  Pooh-Bah holds numerous exalted offices, including Lord Chief Justice, Chancellor of the Exchequer (sorry Darling), Master of the Buckhounds, Lord High Auditor, Groom of the Back Stairs,and Lord High Everything Else

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
